TheÂ SHABBAT RESORTÂ brings a Shabbaton theme to the world stage.Â  Currently located inside other resorts, we are looking for to convert an existing resort to our theme.Â  It contains convention and meeting space, sleeping accommodations, and restaurants fused with the highest standards of safety, kashrus, programs appropriate for the whole family, a kids camp, speakers, entertainers, and we are in development of a full production show.

COSMIC SHABBAT

SHABBATÂ (Shabbos or Sabbath), is the 7th day of the week, the day of rest, commemorating G-d’s rest after 6 days of Creation.Â Â THE SHABBATÂ is the 7th millennium, commemorating 6,000 years from Creation.Â  It is a time of unprecedented peace for the whole world, and will last 1,000 years.Â  This is called the “Cosmic Shabbat”.Â Â 

CALENDAR OF EVENTS

Reservations

Reserve room accommodations, meals, and activities. Schedule your stay and let us know your needs.

Join an Event

Participate in a public event or activity. Peruse through public events and reserve your tickets online.

Create Your Own Event

Need space for a group, party, or convention? We provide all your needs from lighting, sound, decor, staff, meals, room accommodations, and entertainment. We work with private individuals and organizations to host their events in a kosher and safe family-friendly resort.
